items.name: Matcha Kit Kat
items.description: Nestle brings a unique green tea matcha flavor of Japan with this Green Tea Kit Kat. Japan is famous for its 350+ varieties of KitKat flavors, often favored for gifting and tourists to bring an exciting souvenir from Japan. This Kit Kat covered in smooth Matcha Green Tea and filled with the delicious wafer is made with no artificial colors and all-natural flavors.

items.name: Jubes Nata De Coco Drink (Lychee)
items.description: Jubes is a tasty, fruit-based dessert that’s high in fiber, but has zero grams of cholesterol and fat. It’s based around a sweet tasting dish called Nata-de-Coco, which is very popular among the health-conscious. These fruity, juicy treats can be incorporated into mixed drinks, desserts such as ice cream and jello, or they can just be eaten by themselves.

items.name: Dunkaroos
items.description: Dunkaroos are a snack food from Betty Crocker, first launched in 1990. It consists of a snack-sized package containing cookies and frosting; as the name implies, the cookies are meant to be dunked into the frosting before eating. Individual snack packages contain about ten small cookies and one cubic inch of frosting.

items.name: Waffle Crisp
items.description: Waffle Crisp cereal is back! With the same great taste and fun waffle shape you remember, we hope you love the return of Waffle Crisp cereal as much as we do.

items.name: Rilakkuma
items.description: This Rilakkuma Plush is so fuzzy!

items.name: Snorlax
items.description: This Snorlax Lapse of Memory Plush is so big and huggable.

items.name: Pusheen
items.description: This Pusheen Plush is so cute! Display her on your bed or sofa, great for cuddling!

items.name: HUDA BEAUTY Eyeshadow Palette
items.description: Huda’s favorite, Nude Medium’s versatile palette is a rich mix of spicy.

items.name: Skin Transformation Cream
items.description: A hydrating and moisturizing face cream that helps reveal plumped and radiant-looking skin with bakuchiol, malachite, ceramides, and hyaluronic acid.

items.name: Liquid Lash Extensions Mascara
items.description: Instantly create the look of lash extensions with this award-winning, best-selling mascara powered by technology that won't clump, flake or smudge.

items.name: MAC Lipstick Trio
items.description: Provides immediate and long-term hydration.A comfortable formula that blurs lines and smooths lips.It is lightweight.

items.name: LEGO Marvel Spider-Man Attack on the Spider Lair
items.description: Inside the Spider Lair, they’ll find different play areas including a basketball net with basketball launcher, skateboard and quarter pipe, hi-tech command center, and the Spider-Cycle.

items.name: Hot Wheels Toxic Snake Strike
items.description: This easy to set up Hot Wheels playset includes one Hot Wheels vehicle, slime and a giant cobra that must be stopped! Once it’s ready to go, place the Hot Wheels car into the launch pad and slam down to send it flying.

items.name: Sloan Play Kitchen
items.description: Covered on all sides in a child-safe, water-based paint in White.Features a pretend sink, oven, fridge and set of salt and pepper shakers.Faucet handles and knobs turn and doors open.Intended for children aged 3+.

items.name: Hoth Parka
items.description: Don't be stuck outside on a day or night on Hoth a Parka or you'll need to sacrifice your Tauntaun!

items.name: Hoth Com Gloves
items.description: All the warmth you could want for your hands. plus built in communication device..what more could you want!

items.name: Hoth Boots
items.description: No one likes Numb feet! keep you feet warm on the −364 days with the patented Hoth Boots

items.description: Nothing says Dark side like the robe of a Sith Lord!
